messages.subject: Gintama to be animated! TV Tokyo and Sunrise Project coming soon
messages.msgSnippet: To those who does not know what Gintama is, it s came first as a pirate manga with some of the main characters inspired from our very own Shinsengumi men, they
messages.messageBody:
To those who does not know what Gintama is, it's came first as a
pirate manga with some of the main characters inspired from our very
own Shinsengumi men, they even have the same names set in an alternate
universe. I just wanted to let everyone know that TV Tokyo and Sunrise
are going to release Gintama as an Anime this May, 2006. Isn't that
great? *nods* of course it is... LOL! I'm more of an anime person you
see... But anyway here are the japanese websites... and this news is
credited to animenation.net.

http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/anime/gintama/

http://www.sunrise-inc.co.jp/gintama/

So that's it. Thought I'd share.

Also Safety and I have a few downloads (PMK and NHK) and site updates
at HNK.
You can see them here http://hajimenokizu.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=155

That's it. Going on hibernation...

~Kizu
